caption.p: Arrival of spring (date of frost-free nights), arrival of summer (date of GDD 5 = 200), and date of mating, start of incubation, and hatching in capercaillie during 1979â€“2016. In black grouse dates of peak of mating, start of incubation, and hatching occurred 5, 8, and 6 days after capercaillie.
